mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_id, user_id, post_regdate, post_updatedate, post_heart, post_replycount, title, post_content, viewcount, filename) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{userId}, #{postRegdate}, #{postUpdatedate}, #{postHeart}, #{postReplycount}, #{title}, #{postContent}, #{viewcount}, #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, post_heart AS postHeart, post_replycount AS postReplycount, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, viewcount AS viewcount, filename AS filename FROM post WHERE post_id = #{postId}

SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, post_heart AS postHeart, post_replycount AS postReplycount, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, viewcount AS viewcount, filename AS filename FROM post ORDER BY post_regdate DESC
